com.solidfire.element.api

Class ClusterInfo

  • Object
    • ClusterInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class ClusterInfo
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Cluster Info object returns information the node uses to communicate with the cluster.
    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClusterInfo

        @Since(value="7.0")
public ClusterInfo(Map<String,Object> attributes,
                 String encryptionAtRestState,
                 String[] ensemble,
                 String mvip,
                 Long mvipNodeID,
                 String name,
                 Long repCount,
                 String state,
                 String svip,
                 Long svipNodeID,
                 String uniqueID,
                 UUID uuid)
        Cluster Info object returns information the node uses to communicate with the cluster.
        Parameters:
        attributes - [required] List of Name/Value pairs in JSON object format.
        encryptionAtRestState - [required] Encryption at rest state.
        ensemble - [required] Array of Node IP addresses that are participating in the cluster.
        mvip - [required] Management network interface.
        mvipNodeID - [required] Node holding the master MVIP address
        name - [required] Unique cluster name.
        repCount - [required] Number of replicas of each piece of data to store in the cluster.
        state - [required]
        svip - [required] Storage virtual IP
        svipNodeID - [required] Node holding the master SVIP address.
        uniqueID - [required] Unique ID for the cluster.
        uuid - [required]
        Since:
        7.0
